extendedInfo.description: Below is the prerequisite of installer. I bear witness	there is no god but Allah, and Muhammad is his messenger. Also I accept I will not touch Quran without Wudu. If I do, developer is not responsible for my action.  Full Quran with Turkish Translation available. More translations and images will be added next versions.Source code taken from (http://github.com/ahmedre/quran_android) open source project and quran images are from the http://github.com/quran/quran.com-images- Audio recitations are available for streaming and downloading with highlighting support (tap the screen for to get the audio toolbar).- search- beta: night mode- beta: audio repeat- crystal clear Madani compliant images.- beautiful and smooth page transition effect.- works on Android phones without Arabic support.- landscape mode for even larger fonts and more comfortable image viewing.- bookmarking of an unlimited number of pages (tap the screen to find the bookmark button).- translations in many different languages (currently, Arabic Tafseer, English Sahih International Translation, French, German, Indonesian, Malay, Spanish, Turkish, Transliteration, Bosnian, Russian, Bengali, Kurdish, Somali, Dutch, Swahili, Malayalam, Azerbaijani, Tamil, and Urdu) with more coming soon.TÃ¼rkÃ§e Kuran-Ä± Kerim UygulamasÄ±. Android\'in standard\304\261 olan geri tu\305\237una her bas\304\261\305\237\304\261mda d\304\261\305\237ar\304\261 atmas\304\261 barda\304\237\304\261 ta\305\237\304\261rd\304\261. Bu kadar kullan\304\261\305\237s\304\261z bir program g\303\266rmedim. Neredeyse i\303\247imdeki Kuran okuma iste\304\237ini s\303\266nd\303\274recekti.

reviews.title: \303\207ok g\303\274zel
reviews.comment: Cep telefonuma indirdim.\303\207ok g\303\274zel.Ama tabletime indiremedim.Herhalde Server \303\247ok yo\304\237un.Eme\304\237i ge\303\266denen Allah raz\304\261 olsun.

reviews.comment: Neden abdest almadan okunmuyor? Kurandam\304\261 yaz\304\261yor? Abdest almadan okunmaz, tutulmaz diye??? Yaz\304\261lanlar\304\261 bile okumadan, yorumlamadan yaz\304\261p konu\305\237uyoruz.

reviews.title: Cahil pis/hayvandan farki olmay sen.
reviews.comment: Sen ki Allah ina kiymet ve deger vermeyip birde bunun ustune buraya soruyu yazacak vakit var. Fakat aptes alip kuran kerim icin yokmu Hayvan ruhlu.
